Articles.Content:
Lol. Steampunk install is fun.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Love the steam punk look. I love mechanical looking things especially older looking things, might come from working on old cars why I like that sort of thing. Kuddos!

Since I haven't used the steampunk mod yet, the most impressive thing here is that you did it without a grabber. +Rep! I'm sure if I did it the entire spacecraft would tumble out of control causing the universe to implode in a fiery death. Them Krakens, man, they'll take anything as bait!
I would have used the lander struts as the claw, but that works too I guess.
Yes. That is how you would do it. I would have used the structual parts to act as claws since they can take a lot of abuse.
I confess it's not entirely clear what you DID use in place of the claw - could we get a close-up in good light, and/or an explanation for those of us without the mod?

I confess it's not entirely clear what you DID use in place of the claw - could we get a close-up in good light, and/or an explanation for those of us without the mod?

I accelerated at it at 200 m/s, and my ship got stuck inside it until I time warped.
